comments.author: alterra57
comments.body: A stake.com account is not collateral.And are you the same guy behind this other account? https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5412736.0Scamming people isn't nice.

comments.author: Lilacthrow123
comments.body: Not the same person. I used his post as a template though

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: First of all this is not a valid collateral. It is not legal or allowed by their terms sell/borrow a personal stake.com account. in any case you can easily retrieve this account in just a couple of days (just with email registered or thanks to KYC).Offering 20% of interest for this kind of loan seems to good to be true  that's why

comments.author: Lilacthrow123
comments.body: That’s why I said I wasn’t sure… honestly I’m new here and wasn’t sure. Thus the high interest. Thank you for the feedback, I will wait till I have valid collateral for next time
